channel.title: Mit Bitcoin Expo 2020 on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Mit Bitcoin Expo 2020 on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Andrew Poelstra - Taproot (2020-03-07)
item.description: Name: Andrew Poelstra Topic: Taproot - Who, How, Why Location: MIT Bitcoin Expo 2020 Date: March 7th 2020 Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1VtQBVauvhw BIP 341: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0341.mediawiki Intro (Hugo Uvegi) I am excited to introduce our first speaker, Andrew Poelstra. He is coming to us from Blockstream where he is Director of Research. He is going to be talking about Taproot which I think is on everybody’s mind these days. Intro (Andrew Poelstra) Thanks for waking up so early for the first day of the conference and making the trek from the registration room over here.
